A

AnalyzerUtil - Class in it.unipd.dei.se.faderic.analyze
The AnalyzerUtil class provides various utility methods for text analysis, including tokenization, loading of synonym and dictionary lists, and loading of Apache OpenNLP models.

This function retrieves the number of documents to be re-ranked from a configuration file and validates that it is an integer greater than or equal to 2.

This function returns a similarity object based on the value of a property, either BM25 or LMDirichlet, with optional parameters.
getSpellCheckDict() - Static method in class it.unipd.dei.se.faderic.utils.ConfigProperties
This function retrieves a spell check dictionary based on a specified language.
getStemmerName() - Static method in class it.unipd.dei.se.faderic.utils.ConfigProperties
This function retrieves the stemmer name from a properties file and returns it as an enum value, throwing an exception if the stemmer name is not available for the specified language.
getStopSet() - Static method in class it.unipd.dei.se.faderic.utils.ConfigProperties
This function returns a set of stop words based on the language specified in the properties file or defaults to English or French.
getSynonymAnalyzer() - Static method in class it.unipd.dei.se.faderic.utils.ConfigProperties
This function returns a synonym analyzer based on the language and configuration properties.
getTopicsFile() - Static method in class it.unipd.dei.se.faderic.utils.ConfigProperties
This function retrieves the topics file path from a properties file based on the language and throws an exception if the property is not found.

incrementToken() - Method in class it.unipd.dei.se.faderic.analyze.PositionFilter
This function increments the token position if the position increment attribute is not equal to zero.
incrementToken() - Method in class it.unipd.dei.se.faderic.analyze.SynonymPOSFilter
This function checks if there are any extra tokens, and if so, it sets the position increment to 0 and appends the next extra token; otherwise, it gets synonyms for the current token, saves the state, and returns true if there are more tokens.
index() - Method in class it.unipd.dei.se.faderic.index.DirectoryIndexer

it.unipd.dei.se.faderic - package it.unipd.dei.se.faderic

SynonymAnalyzer - Class in it.unipd.dei.se.faderic.analyze
The SynonymAnalyzer class is a Java class that analyzes text by replacing synonyms, removing stop words, and flattening the resulting graph.

Constructor for the class using an empty stoplist

Constructor for the class
SynonymPOSAnalyzer - Class in it.unipd.dei.se.faderic.analyze
The SynonymPOSAnalyzer class is a Java class that extends the Analyzer class and uses OpenNLP OpenNLPTokenizer and OpenNLPPOSFilter to analyze text and also includes a custom synonym filter.
SynonymPOSAnalyzer(Analyzer) - Constructor for class it.unipd.dei.se.faderic.analyze.SynonymPOSAnalyzer
Constructor for the class
SynonymPOSFilter - Class in it.unipd.dei.se.faderic.analyze
The SynonymPOSFilter class is a Java implementation of a token filter that uses WordNet to find synonyms of input tokens based on their part-of-speech tags.
SynonymPOSFilter(TokenStream, Analyzer) - Constructor for class it.unipd.dei.se.faderic.analyze.SynonymPOSFilter
Constructor for the class
